description: Illustration for 70x95cm poster created for scenography of the Rider Weekends music festival(2016) where, with 3 artists, we paste up the event area. Check https://www.behance.net/gallery/66548819/Festival-Rider-Weekends Started to make Graffiti in Rio in 2000. His work consists in a character that populates the urban space and dialogue with the people of the city. It`s led him to create a lot of folds and made it a classic character in Rio scene.
